name: PROTOTYPE 001
description:
"Most Prototypes are the beginnings of beautiful things....

However...

Not all of us get to be so lucky."

PROTOTYPE 001 is a tiny story about a long forgotten video game project that unfortunately never made it out of it's initial prototype phase. After so much time has passed... Something terrible is happening.

Will you stop it?

Or is this world even worth saving?

You decide.

-----

Controls: 

  • Movement: Arrow keys or WASD
  • Advance textbox: Space or Enter
  • Toggle Fullscreen : ESC

-----

Credits:

Art, Music, Programming, Story by Jonny Andino
